name: chronos
description: A fault tolerant job scheduler for Mesos which handles dependencies and ISO8601 based schedules.
postInstallNotes:
The Chronos (Job Scheduling/Cron Scheduling) DCOS Service implementation has been successfully installed!
In order for Chronos to start successfully, all resources must be available in the cluster, including ports, CPU shares, Ram and Disk.
We recommend a minimum of one slave with at least 1 CPU and 2GB of RAM available for use by the Chronos Service.

	Documentation: https://github.com/mesos/chronos
	Issues: https:/github.com/mesos/chronos/issues
